__e: I never want to see another musician again in my entire life.
- Or maybe you'll be the best musician ever.
He's--he's running, uh, past a cafe, and--and there's a street musician in front.
As a musician, he's just, you know... okay.
But, being a good musician, he's doing the right thing:
If he wasn't playing music, it's not like he would get another job.
I'm glad you're a musician and not an actor, dad, 'cause our family would have starved.
I mean, even if you are a musician and an Englishman don't you think that you're carrying things just a little bit too far?
But I'm a musician and I want you to be proud of me for that too.
